com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.layout

Interface LayoutManager.LaidOutComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLaidOutComponent
    Enclosing interface:
    LayoutManager

    public static interface LayoutManager.LaidOutComponent
    This interface represents a component that has been placed on an area. You can use the methods exposed by it to retrieve details about each component within the layout and where the LayoutManager believes they should be placed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Component getComponent() 
      TerminalSize getSize() 
      TerminalPosition getTopLeftPosition() 

    • Method Detail

      • getComponent

        Component getComponent()
        Returns:
        The component that was positioned

      • getSize

        TerminalSize getSize()
        Returns:
        Size the component is allowed to use

      • getTopLeftPosition

        TerminalPosition getTopLeftPosition()
        Returns:
        Position, relative to the assigned area's top left corner (which would be 0x0 here), of the top-left corner of the component.
